description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for creating a booking. It includes a stateful widget with form inputs for selecting check-in and check-out dates, handles form validation, displays date pickers, manages loading state, calls a bookings service to create a booking, and navigates to a payment screen upon success.

classes.name: BookingCreateScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget for creating a booking, accepting an optional room ID.

classes.name: _BookingCreateScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the booking creation form, date selections, service interactions, and navigation.

methods.name: _selectDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker and updates the state with the selected date for check-in or check-out.

methods.name: _handleCreateBooking
methods.description: Validates the form, manages loading state, calls the booking creation service, and handles success or error responses, including navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the booking creation screen with form fields, date selectors, and a submit button.
